HOME.TITLE: Welcome to my portfolio
HOME.DESCRIPTION: I am a developer passionate about Angular.

PROFILE.TITLE: Profile
PROFILE.BIO: Application developer with a bachelor's degree in computer science, specialized in web and application development. Passionate about modern technologies and creating reliable and high-performance solutions. Experience in professional and academic environments including full-stack development, project management, and agile teamwork. Motivated, autonomous, and curious, I am seeking a first job to consolidate my skills and grow within a technical team.

BACHELOR.DIPLOMA: Bachelor of Computer Science - Application Development
BACHELOR.DESCRIPTION: Computer science studies focused on the development of web and software applications, with a solid background in programming, databases and project management.

SECONDARY.INSTITUTION: Ath Provincial Institute of Secondary Education
SECONDARY.DIPLOMA: Higher Secondary Education Certificate - Computer Technician
SECONDARY.DESCRIPTION: A versatile IT training course covering the fundamentals of hardware, networks, technical support and an introduction to development.

INTERNSHIP.ADDRESS: Rue Montagne du Parc 3, 1000 Brussels, Belgium
INTERNSHIP.DESCRIPTION-1: Development of an internal web application for managing deals related to fixed and floating rate deposits.
INTERNSHIP.DESCRIPTION-2: Implementation of monthly monitoring for deposit revaluation.
INTERNSHIP.DESCRIPTION-3: Participation in analysis, development, and testing phases.
INTERNSHIP.DESCRIPTION-4: Technologies: C#, ASP.NET, .NET Core, SQL Server, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax, IIS.

HIGHSCHOOL.ADDRESS: Chemin de la laiterie 28, 7812 Mainvault, Belgium
HIGHSCHOOL.DESCRIPTION-1: Website development in HTML, CSS, and PHP.
HIGHSCHOOL.DESCRIPTION-4: Interacting with clients to understand their needs and provide technical support. Optimizing system performance and maintaining security.

HIGHSCHOOL_INTERNSHIP.DESCRIPTION-1: Participation in the development of web and mobile projects.
HIGHSCHOOL_INTERNSHIP.DESCRIPTION-2: Testing, debugging, and improving existing features.
